title: How Khan Academy Successfully Handled 2.5x Traffic in a Week
If someone asks if you have any questions, ask a question
description: Let's revisit one of the most humiliating (and expensive) moments of my life. It happened a decade ago and even today I cringe and seethe when I think about it. I was one of 25 finalists for a $20,000 scholarship in my junior year of college. The last step was an hour long interview with [â€¦]
